title: Friend's account was compromised
body:
So a few nights ago my friend tried to log into his account after taking some time away from the game, but couldn't. He tried to reset his password, but never got the email. After looking up his account, fatm0ng3r, it appears someone was playing on the account for a couple months, between February and May of this year. He hasn't played since early 2016 if i remember correctly. The account is currently Gold 3, sporting a 67% winrate. 

Would a Rioter please look into this matter? He's had this account probably since season 1 and I'd hate to see him lose his account. He's also submitted a ticket, but hasn't heard anything about it. I created this post just to help him out.

Thank you for reading this, hopefully Riot can help with this.

replies.body: Have your friend continue talking with our account agents in his ticket. They'll be able to verify him there, and repair any damage the compromiser might have done.
